title: A Quick Trick to Make a Java Stream Construction Lazy
description: One of the Stream APIs greatest features is its laziness. The whole pipeline is constructed lazily, stored as a set of instructions, akin to a SQL execution plan. Only when we invoke a terminal operation, the pipeline is started. It is still lazy, meaning that some operations may be short circuited. Some third party libraries â€¦

title: How to Make Good Code Reviews Better
